name: Maze Candy Mania: Swipe Horror Runner Game
name_original: Maze Candy Mania: Swipe Horror Runner Game
description:
A new flavor of Match,3 game , Easy to learn but challenging to master

If you Experience of hit apps

Match candies to collect them, and sweeten the value of neighboring candies. Easy to learn but challenging to master

Play through over 300 levels of candy collecting craziness!

, Stock up on Candy Lemon Drops, Jelly Beans and gummies like that look good enough to eat!

, Match at least three pieces of candy to pop them and add them to your collection

, Collect all the candies of a certain color to win!
